tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE sustainability_standards (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    certification VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    compliance_check BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE eco_friendly_items (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    sustainability_rating VARCHAR(50),
    price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE item_certifications (
    certification_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    certification_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    issue_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE compliance_checks (
    check_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_id INT,
    certification_id INT,
    compliance_result BOOLEAN,
    check_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (item_id) REFERENCES eco_friendly_items(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (certification_id) REFERENCES item_certifications(certification_id)
)

CREATE TABLE item_certifications (
    item_id INT,
    certification_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (item_id) REFERENCES items(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (certification_id) REFERENCES certifications(id),
    PRIMARY KEY (item_id, certification_id)
);
